data.text: @cspotweet Alberta should get a Chief Medical officer ? Oh wait ….
@cspotweet The NDP should be exiled from politics! That party is right up there with the Liberals.

@Kauwhaka @cspotweet Snookums, "most" don't agree with masking being ended, because we aren't idiots who believe Kenney's "Covid is over just live with it" spew.

Oh, and when PMJT decides to override provincial jurisdiction to "unify Canada", you better be supporting that.
You will.  Right?
Right?
@cspotweet Health is & always was provincial jurisdiction. Cut the shit & learn about the “democracy” you currently live under.

@cspotweet Tell NDP Joe Ceci that having city mayors think they can override and disregard the governments decisions/policies is a direct attack on democracy and goes against the wishes of Albertans, most of who support the ending of forced-masking laws. #yeg #yyc #ableg #covid19ab
